resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107615</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107615</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202774</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Understanding Audience</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstehende Publikum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assistances d'arrangement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Audiências Compreensivas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pubblici Capenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση του ακροατηρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Audiencias Que entienden</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity is designed to help students identify their audience and determine appropriate language use based on the audience.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität ist konzipiert, um 
Kursteilnehmern zu helfen, ihre Publikum zu kennzeichnen und den 
passenden Sprachengebrauch festzustellen, der auf den Publikum 
basiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité est conçue pour aider des 
étudiants à identifier leurs assistances et à déterminer 
l'utilisation appropriée de langage basée sur les assistances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade é projetada ajudar a estudantes 
identificar suas audiências e determinar o uso apropriado da língua 
baseado nas audiências.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività è destinata per aiutare gli 
allievi ad identificare i loro pubblici ed a determinare l'uso adatto 
di linguaggio basato sui pubblici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα έχει ως σκοπό να βοηθήσει τους 
σπουδαστές να προσδιορίσουν το ακροατήριό τους και να καθορίσουν 
την κατάλληλη γλωσσική χρήση βασισμένη στο ακροατήριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad se diseña para ayudar a 
estudiantes a identificar a sus audiencias y a determinar el uso 
apropiado del lenguaje basado en las audiencias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JULIE JOSLIN
FN:JULIE JOSLIN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202774</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107615</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/understanding-audience</uri>

  </manifestation>
